name: About:Blank Black (or custom color, iframe-safe)
description:
Does what it says. Works with iframes!
Hit "Advanced Style Options" to choose your own color.
Firefox users might also want this style for about:newtab
To remove white flashing when opening a new page, use this style
additional_info:
/*****************************************
REMOVED DUE TO STYLISH PRIVACY INVASION 
more info here: https://www.theregister.co.uk/2018/07/05/browsers_pull_stylish_but_invasive_browser_extension/

My styles will probably soon be available here: https://openusercss.org/profile/5b3e81947d90940b00ad06a4
*****************************************/
